caption: Tried this place on the recommendation of a friend. The guy who was taking orders literally didn’t speak English almost at all, so the language barrier was too difficult to overcome. Besides that, more than ⅓ of the food advertised on the menu wasn’t being served or was simply “out”. It was very frustrating to ask for the food I wanted 4x or 5x and STILL not have the man understand what I was ordering. On top of that, the man taking the order was very impolite and it seemed like we were bothering him by trying to place our order. Maybe he was as frustrated with the language barrier as we were. I didn’t know. We wound up walking out, simply because I wasn’t able to place an order. Added photo as proof that I was actually here, and to authenticate this review.
This is under new management than COVID hits. I'm glad to see they are still around and i have been going there ordering their food the past few months.  Their goat curry and biryani rice very good.

This place is amazing! Got the true authentic taste of Pakistani food. During the pandemic when many businesses we not willing to deliver I was a able to reach out to them and receive fast delivery as well. Their sweets are fresh and hand made, everyone as to try them. I will definitely recommend to all my friends and family. Keep up the good work guys 5 Stars ⭐️

I posted a review twice on another account about this restaurant but some how it never made it through. Anyways just get ready to be ripped off by this terrible place. I ordered a pound of PAKORA FISH and the guy charged me $16 instead of $12 coz he put some extra fish in the container. When I got home and opened it, there were 4 huge pieces of LEMON inside. He weighed fish and lemon together for the price of fish. They over charge and the taste is also bad. STAY AWAY.
This one is best restaurant and best fresh food served in Brooklyn.

Royal kinara is an amazing restaurant. I love their food so much. The dining hall is very big also, perfect for family functions. Their food is always freshly made. My favorite restaurant along with Pinos and skyway!!
Loveeee the place with all my heart !!

This place is under new management and the service and atmosphere is so bad now. I went in around 8pm and the worker at the counter was hanging out with his friends rather than coming to take my order. This is not a family place anymore. They have random guys going into the kitchen and talking very loud about their own personal business. The food is still the same and taste good. I hope the owner teaches his workers to be professional and dont allow random guys to walk behind the counters and kitchen. I'm sure the good reviews are from friends of the owner but please be real and say it how it is.
New management is doing good job
This is under new management, i stopped coming before but i have them another chance and wow just amazing food, very delicious,
